docs.lead_paragraph: Chairman Wilbur Mills of the House Ways and Means Committee will open hearings tomorrow on the many and varied plans on Capitol Hill for modifying or revolutionizing this country's medical care system. Mr. Mills' power is such that his conclusions could greatly influence the future of American medicine.
docs.abstract: H Schwartz article, noting start of HR (Mills) hearings on altering US health care system, cites HEW Dept figures on health of Amer people as supporting evidence that Amers are enjoying good health and health care despite desire of some politicians to alter US med system
